basics.name: Eunjung Yeo
basics.label: Researcher, Computational Linguist
basics.summary: A computational linguist specializing in Speech AI applications for pathological speech, with a strong focus on computational phonetics and phonology.

courses: Speech AI for Korean Dysarthric Speech

Research Experience.name: ChangeLing Lab, Language Technologies Institute, Carnegie Mellon University
Research Experience.summary: Research on computational phonetics and phonology, with a special focus on speech AI applications for pathological speech.
highlights: cross-language intelligibility assessment for dysarthric speech

Research Experience.name: Spoken Language Processing Lab, Linguistics Department, Seoul National University
Research Experience.position: Ph.D. Student Researcher, M.A. Student Researcher
Research Experience.summary: Research on automatic speech assessment on pathologcial speech & nonnative speech

Research Experience.name: Department of Speech-Language Pathology, Yonsei University
Research Experience.summary: Research on motor speech disorders (Parkinson's). Collected and Analyzed cognitive, speech, swallowing data from healthy elderly individuals.

Research Experience.name: Institute of Language and Information Studies, Yonsei University
Research Experience.summary: Drafted Korean digital dictionary & Collected L2 Korean writing data.
